variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: De-identified Sample ID

variable.name: IS_TUMOR
variable.description: Tumor status

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Analyte Type

variable.name: sample_type
variable.description: How tissue sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: BRAF_mutation_type
variable.description: Somatic mutation in TP53 (Entrez GeneID: 673)?

variable.name: KRAS_mutation_type
variable.description: Somatic mutation in KRAS (Entrez GeneID: 3845)?

variable.name: TP53_mutation
variable.description: Somatic mutation in TP53 (Entrez GeneID: 7157)?

variable.name: Type of Procedure
variable.description: Describes the type of procedure performed to collect pathology sample.

variable.name: Synchronous Primary Tumours
variable.description: Indicates whether more than one tumour is present.

variable.name: Tumour Size (cm)
variable.description: Indicates the greatest dimension of the largest tumour in centimetres (cm)

variable.name: Grade/Diff
variable.description: Indicates the level/grade of differentiation

variable.name: Lymphatic Invasion
variable.description: Indicates whether lymphatic invasion is documented within the tumour.

variable.name: Vascular Invasion
variable.description: Indicates whether vascular invasion is documented within the tumour.

variable.name: Perineural Invasion
variable.description: Indicates whether perineural invasion is documented within the tumour.

variable.name: Perineal Invasion
variable.description: Indicates the presence of perineal invasion.

variable.name: Extramural Blood Vessel Invasion
variable.description: Indicates the presence of extramural blood vessel invasion

variable.name: Extracapsular Nodal Extension
variable.description: Indicates whether extracapsular nodal extension is documented.

variable.name: Perforation
variable.description: Indicates whether the bowel was perforated. Refers to clinical and pathological documented perforation.

variable.name: Peritoneal Seeding
variable.description: Indicates whether peritoneal seeding has been documented

variable.name: Pathological T
variable.description: Indicates the primary tumour stage determined pathologically at the time of diagnosis and prior to any treatment.

variable.name: Pathological N
variable.description: Indicates the extent of nodal involvement determined pathologically at the time of diagnosis and prior to any treatment.

variable.name: Clinical M
variable.description: Indicates the metastatic stage.
variable.value: MX - Distant metastasis cannot be assessed
